credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 62 x 61 cm (24 7/16 x 24 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: counted satin, double running, stem and cross stitches on plain weave
description: Central square with decoration and inscription ("Made by Teresa Alvares in this year 1700").  Surrounded by a wide border with corner designs.  Tassels at each corner.
name: Sampler
